Reviews.Title: Huge phone!
Reviews.Author: surftalk
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from Note 2 and loving every second of it! Got it activated on AT&T; today and everything is running smoothly so far! From the reviews i read they said the screen is slightly duller than some other phones but I find the display to be gorgeous!

Reviews.Title: awessome phone.
Reviews.Author: Romar
Reviews.Content: so far so good the phone works great,beautyfull screen,fast internet using tmobile hspa,hspa plus here in Boston area.Very glad i bough it,so far no cons.thank you.

Reviews.Title: great phone tablet all in one
Reviews.Author: Alan G. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: the phone is large easy to read and watch movies  its a tablet with phone i would purchase this product again remember with al samsung  phones and tablets  to print  you will need the  hp  eprint app

Reviews.Title: Big screen and lots of funtions on this phone
Reviews.Author: belt
Reviews.Content: Works great love all the features you can watch tv or play games with ease.  I would purchase this same phone again and again

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: jamell a scott
Reviews.Content: This phone is really nice. The screen is big and very clear. Worked with my T-Mobile . Would recommend this phone. The price is right and very attractive phone.

Reviews.Title: The mega isnt trying to be anything but what it is!
Reviews.Author: Capsulegang
Reviews.Content: hello all ive owned several galaxy including two s3's since i liked the phone so much. ive read many reviews myself before purchasing and all had a tone of its good but its too big. i personally have big hand and yes took a few days getting used to. i also wanted a tablet but didnt want to carry a second electronic.phone size its really big but if u own an ipad mini u may not think so. debates that s4 has better resolution, spec wise yes but imo the screen the mega provides is great, processor may be a hair slower then s4 but it still out performs other brand phones and gets the job done smoothly, netflix movies looks great games play awesome i cant really say anything negative as others point out its huge, i wanted a huge device otherwise buy a more expensive s4,the battery life is amazing i can play games surf the web etc and still make it home with plenty of juice left, and it charges remarkably quick.if your like myself u dont talk much and text and browse web n games this is a good compromise between phone and tablet,once again s4 may have a slight edge but its no slow poke gets the job done without having to squint into tiny screenone note of caution get a good case like an otterbox, bigger screen is easier to crack vs tiny screen

Reviews.Title: SCAM
Reviews.Author: FRUSTRATED
Reviews.Content: If I could rate ZERO I would... At first, I have placed an order with PVCS on October 21st for Unlocked Samsung Galaxy Mega 6.3 (White phone). The shipment had been in transit for 3 days and the item will be delivered the next day until I got an email from PVCS on the 3rd night apologizing that they do not have the White phone in stock only Black. When I placed the order they have 8 in stock available. I cancelled my order but I did not get credited after a week (Oct 30th). When I clicked their link on my Orders it directed me to another seller. It looked like they changed their name and bumped up the price for White phone.. I read reviews about PVCS before placing the order, I thought they have good ratings but they have proven me wrong! The 2nd time I have placed an order was with OPEN GROUP WIRELESS for the same item on Oct 25th (Black this time, for some reason White is hard to come by, but Im still hoping they will have White available). Scheduled shipment on Oct 28th BUT they shipped a Red Nikon camera coolpix s6500 instead!!! How could they messed this up? You would think they would print out the order slip and the invoice to match with the item before shipping?? I contacted the customer service so they could issue a return shipping label. I had to look for UPS drop off location, wasted my time and not to mention I can NOT get refunded until they receive the item back and will only credit it back to my bank account in 2 weeks.The 3rd time (you would think I would learn my lesson by now) I placed an order on Oct 29th with CELL-SOURCE this time for the same item. Their ads says "available one day shipping for Prime" member, so I placed the order. Upon check out the shipping confirmation is expected to be delivered on Thursday Oct 31st by 8pm, whatever happened to one day shipping for Prime member? so I was a little bit disappointed about this. The next morning of Oct 30th, says it's been shipped and it's in my hometown on Oct 30th at 7:16pm. I have waited, been stuck in the house all day waiting for the package to come in. It is Oct 31st and past 9pm, I still haven't received the package. I got a hold of the customer service, again, about 2 hours ago to express my frustration. I was told that the shipment is expected by Nov 2nd, and if not the item is considered as LOST. I have been having so much problems with these 3 sellers just to get the item I want. How hard is that??? The one thing I've noticed they keep on changing their names. This review will be copied and pasted to all 3 sellers... Amazon.com is losing their credibility if they will allow and continue this type of service...

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Z.
Reviews.Content: I got this phone in about 2 or 3 days during the holiday. Much faster than I thought. And the phone is lovely.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Euna
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with everything.I am old so I love the large screen especially.No regret at all with this.About internet, fast enough!

Reviews.Title: #bigphone#6.3#720pscreen#1080picandcam#happy#biggerisbetter
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Hudson
Reviews.Content: So glad that I have a big phone. Huge screen. No more phone in face. I can see this screen 3 feet away.

Reviews.Title: Bigger maybe better with this unlock Samsung
Reviews.Author: eric james
Reviews.Content: Great phone. I bought it as a gift for a friend. And she absolutely love it. I guess the bigger phones are taking over.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful phone. Better than my note 2
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had the note 2 and loved it when I heard about the mega 6.3 I had to have it. This is the best phone I have come across. You read so many reviews saying how big it is I'm telling you don't go by what you read. If you own or even seen the note 2 or 3 its slightly bigger than that nothing to freak out about. It is pretty much identical to the note 2 or 3 so don't let ppl make you second guess it you will love it. I know I do. Also I received the phone a day and a half after I ordered it very fast shipping.  :)

Reviews.Title: samsung mega
Reviews.Author: Adam DeGroat
Reviews.Content: Fast processor. Beautiful display. Smooth interface. This phone exceeded my expectations. The size of the screen makes reading documents more convienient as well.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: OzarkWiseWoman "Kay"
Reviews.Content: I never owned a smartphone before & sure had reservations but small budget considerations inspired me to try it because I wanted to stay with Straight Talk.  Still, when it arrived I thought oh no, what have I done-- since I don't have anyone to answer any question or help at all.  I followed directions but then realized I had to have the Straight Talk micro Sim card before I could activate so get that first!!  Be sure to find out at Walmart if  you need the ATT or Tmobile--  I didn't have a clue but the pack I got at Walmart had both so when I called Straight Talk to activate they waited while I found correct one in the pack I bought-& switched them .  I  found their Customer Service to be very helpful.  So --- I had this up & running right away & love it!  Great price for great product, easy to install & use even for non-techie senior like me!

Reviews.Title: Big Phone
Reviews.Author: Happy Mom!!!
Reviews.Content: This phone is super big.  Work wells.  Attract people's eyes.  I will recommend this to everyone needing super big phone.

Reviews.Title: Loving it.
Reviews.Author: Mauro S
Reviews.Content: Love it.  Size is great, quality & responsiveness.  A bit slow some times getting wireless on/off.  Signal is excellent and IT DOES FIT IN MY POCKET .. :)

Reviews.Title: No LTE-----NO PROBLEM!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Wheels"
Reviews.Content: Received this two days ago.  I have had all the Notes, S4 and tried the S5 for about a week and currently have the Nexus 5.  This baby is just the thing for old guys like me who are finding it harder and harder to see tiny stuff on a screen.  I no longer have to use my Tab3 and it will be going on eBay.  I was a bit worried that it didn't have LTE, even though the signal pounds hard here in Phoenix.  However, the H+ I get all the time here seems to be only about 2 mgs slower each way on Oklaa Speed Tester.  Camera is very good too.  Remember folks, when we got our first 3mp camera and how monsterous we thought that was.  I am convinced unless you are using the camera as a professional photographer 8 mp is plenty good.  Same goes with speed.  Not 800 or 801 processor????  You mean we have to wait 4 milliseconds for a screen to change or an app to open instead of 1?  If your time is that precious to you, methinks you need to think about a lifestyle change or less coffee or something.  I am as happy and probably more happy (because of the screen size) with this than my Nexus 5, which will also be going on eBay.  My second most favorite thing is the volume.  Awesome.  Call quality is great with a LOUD speakerphone.  So, if you can live with a big screen and no LTE you have to try this magnificent device.

Reviews.Title: It makes other big phones look small...
Reviews.Author: Shawn C.
Reviews.Content: Thank you Samsung for filling the niche market of those who want to get biggest display they can get in a phone at reasonable Price. Mega isn't premium phone in today's standards as it uses last year's specs. It's bigger but not better. STILL, that is perfectly fine by me. I wanted bigger display. I didn't need better specs. The phone isn't slow at all, but it just isn't as fast as the today's premium phones. Still upgrade in speed in real life is not very noticeable in my opinion. As for the display, now smaller 5" display phones are sporting 1080P Full HD display, but Mega "only" has 720P HD display. Can't you tell the difference in real life? I doubt it. The display looks beautiful. Period. I have Nexus 2nd gen with 1080P display with bigger 7" display. When I compare 720P and 1080P videos on Nexus, I don't notice the difference in extra resolution in a small 7" display. So what benefit do we gain in getting higher resolution after 720P? Hmmmm... perhaps a satisfaction in "knowing" that I have higher resolution although I may not "see" the difference. You will see the 6.3" vs 5.5" difference very clearly though. Bottom line, if you don't mind carrying around a big phone, you will enjoy the mega. If 6.3" mega is simply too big, don't get it. This is a love it or hated phone. I am actually glad that they used the older specs since I can get a bigger display phone like Mega for a price much lower than the newer Note 3 or S4 with smaller display but higher resolution.

Reviews.Title: 100% recommend
Reviews.Author: Mario B.
Reviews.Content: I have purchased many samsung phones I can say this is one of my favorites for its design, camera, speed and size is obviously super comfortable and goes into the pocket

Reviews.Title: Arrived as Promised!!
Reviews.Author: 40angle1
Reviews.Content: My Samsung Galaxy Mega arrived as promised on time. I received a new sim card from att. My phone is the bomb. It has so many different gadgets. The reception is great!!!

Reviews.Title: A BIG phone with moderate specs
Reviews.Author: S. Hardy "-SuPa23-"
Reviews.Content: My intial thoughts on this phone was "WOW! This phone is huge!", however, this novelty soon wore off. Aside from the fact that the 6.3 inch dispaly is quite beautiful (yes even for a 720p larger display), the phone really has moderate specs as compared to the higher end phones. I've never really been the biggest fan of Samsung's TouchWhiz UI (having owned an S4, Note 2, and Note 8 tablet) mostly due to the half second lag that seems to follow swyping from screen to screen, or opening an app, but in the past I've usually been able to modify the settings enough to make it work for me. I find that I can't tweek this phone as much as I'd like to due to the fact that the developer's option is gone. I ususally found that if I turned off the animations, S voice, and other options that I normally don't use then TouchWhiz runs pretty fast, but again I can't do that here. Also I'm not sure if it's the 1.5 gig of RAM, but I find myself constantly restarting this phone due to the screen freezing. Maybe I'm just trying to do to many things at once, but why put a multitasking option into a phone if the phone can't constantly support multitasking?Again this is just my honest opinion about the Galaxy Mega 6.3. I still rated it 3 stars for 3 reasons: the size of the screen, the fact that I can sync all my notes I've taken from on my Note 8 to the phone, and the battery(3200 mAH battery) that can easily go all day without the worries of having to recharge your phone half way through the day. Overall, a moderate BIG phone that has its issues as well as its perks. I guess it really comes down to how you use your phone in everyday life.

Reviews.Title: Alright
Reviews.Author: JESSICA DURHAM
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write reviews but since i spent 500 bucks on this I will. First off I just had the att version of this phone but it was lost or stolen so I really wanted to replace it but not with att so I found this one. It is not the same. Now it is very close but not the same. The pictures look very grainy and just old school. the screen is just not a clear screen. I would describe it as not being high definition verses usually seeing through high definition, you can notice. There are a couple other things like I am not seeing 4g lte anywhere on this phone.. It only picks up 4g no lte so far for me. So besides that it is a great phone all around especially for the price seeing as others are 6-700$. I love how big it is, I seriously don't need the computer or tablet anymore. Camera takes decent pics but nothing special. Overall I give it 3 stars and would recommend it if you can stand not seeing things in high definition all the time, even text is grainy.

Reviews.Title: slow purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i have gone back to school in my old age, and see no reason to be burdened with carrying books. my first semester i used my ancient galaxy exhibit 4g and note 8.0, and found i could do everything easily with ebooks and no laptop. yeah kindle pdf service. but i liked the newer os of the note so much i decided to retire the exhibit and replace it. i considered seriously a note 3, with larger screen and newer software, but comparing it with the mega never convinced me it was worth the extra $300. so, a month ago, i sprung for the mega. reviews on amazon and questioning purchasers helped my decision a lot.first, the only bad i've found. it does not claim to have 4g connectivity in this country and it doesn't. a good friend bought a note 3 at the same time, and it gets much faster data.the rest, all good. today's slow isn't too slow. i use t-mobile and get edge service in fayetteville, ar, and it loads texts very quickly, photos quickly, and videos slowly. but videos are mostlybjustcslow-starting. after about 45 seconds everything smooths out.battery life is superb, noticeably better than my friend's note 3. when i am gone all day, with nearly constant usage of some sort, including strava on my bike, the battery is seldom below 50%! it has only sunk as low as 38%. since that was one of the reasons i wanted a big phone, i'm well pleased.and, the newer os (android 4.2.2) runs all my apps just about flawlessly. the phone itself is very quick, and there's fast wifi just about everywhere in fayetteville, so i hardly miss 4g.but the biggest advantage is just how clear and huge everything is. the mega is the best reader i've found, being easier to hold than my kindle, but with a lighted screen and the ability to play musicvin the background.and, it's tough. i can't return it quite as new if i should want to because it came out of my jacket pocket at about 20mph on a concrete bike trail and slightly scratched one corner.the camera is not as super duper as a note 3 or an s4, but the big screen makes composition very pleasant.so, this semester, my note and the little bag i've carried it in may stay home.this may not be the phone for you, however, even if you bought the att&t; version with 4g connectivity (and a higher price). it's size does make it ahandfull. i much prefer loose pockets so i can get a firm grasp on it before pulling it out. it's definitely a two-handed device, except for all of the things one can do with voice commands.but as the one ring to rule them all, after taking months to ponder it, i'm pleased. i hope the next iteration of gear will be compatable with it.

Reviews.Title: OMG WHERE DO I BEGIN!!!
Reviews.Author: Ms_Donrica
Reviews.Content: First off for those of us in the US who loves 4g lte well this phone does not offer it as it states HOWEVER this H++ service performs just the same. I received my phone today and hadnt put it down yet. I can go on and on. I had the mega 6.3 4g lte ATT phone in blue but as u know they dont offer the white mega 6.3 4g lte in the US but l would definitely l repeat l would definitely recommend getting this phone. Again its not 4g lte but this H++ internet speed performs just as good. Im so happy.  also l am no longer an ATT customer l switched to prepaid "Straight Talk" and this phone works perfectly!!!! The only thing l didnt like but got over, the lil white piece on the battery that indicates water damage if pink is missing and the back cover looked a tad bit used. But everything else is perfect so far. Shipping was awesone. Ok lm through ;-)

Reviews.Title: an unlock GSM 3g smart phone only.
Reviews.Author: Smith Zhang
Reviews.Content: LTE(Long Term Evelution) is standart 4g speed. GSM is 3g base, not support any 4g (like LTE)  So, this is only a GSM 3G smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Fail
Reviews.Author: Gadget Lover
Reviews.Content: I've used the Note 1 for the last year or so. Overall, a great phone.  But it eventually died on me and I just replaced it with the Mega, hoping bigger was better.While slightly bigger in screen size, the resolution feels (and I believe is) weaker relative to the Note. Icons seem bigger, so you don't get more efficiency of size. It would be great if you could scale down the icon size or content and fit more content on the screen, but you can't.Speakers suck.No noticeable improvements over the Note.Battery life not impressive so far.I'd say skip it!

Reviews.Title: Great phone with a kickass battery!
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: I used to have the s3 which I loved except I literally had to plug in at 4 o'clock in the afternoon everyday, even with little use. I wanted something with a larger screen and also with a battery that lasted for the whole day. With the Mega I have not once had to plug it in until night.  Even with heavy use, watching videos, editing  videos and other activities, the battery always lasts me the whole day.The only thing I've noticed about the screen is that if you have it tilted back a lot it's kind of hard to see (compared to the s3) but that is such a minor issue. You can see it just fine in the daylight (even better than s3).Yes, you can put it in your pocket.  Several of the high school kids have challenge me.  I've had them try and even the boys who wear the skinny jeans can fit it.Bought a prepaid SIM card for tmobile at Walmart and had it up and running in no time (no special adjustments needed).  Wifi is fast.The only other negative I can think of is that I had to figure out how to change the language from French. Wish I could remember because then I could tell you guys.  It's cool because it also came with an international power supply, so it will come in handy the next time I visit Italy.  I'm using my old s3 charger. ..but Samsung includes an adapter for US outlets if you need one.

Reviews.Title: samsung phone
Reviews.Author: genise
Reviews.Content: wonderful phone no  problems,never had no problems.Had a samsung galaxy 2. had some problems.not until now.no problems at all.wonderful phone

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: KAYNE H.
Reviews.Content: Have it on att currently it would work on straight talk also. Is a great phone huge screen has the Wow factor for sure. Not sure on how the lte works but have had no issue opening anything anywhere gets great signal and service. works better than verizon Motorola droid maxx and supposed lte that they charge big bucks for.

Reviews.Title: mega
Reviews.Author: more
Reviews.Content: Step up from note 2 easy for eyes portable need more memory and speed still better than s4. Indeed good display like landscape home screen note 3 should have this feature

Reviews.Title: The display has developed yellow patch
Reviews.Author: Abhirup
Reviews.Content: The display has developed yellow patch. It's such a pity as otherwise its a great phone...I had been through real trouble because of this Phone. This one was shipped from france, i had got it in USA, I was back in India for holidays and got it checked- they asked for around 150$ to fix this. It was not even 6 months old when this came up. It's really bad for samsung and I had been such an advocate of Samsung products. i recommended to everyone that they should buy Samsung phones and never an overpriced apple phone- but guess I was wrong.

Reviews.Title: it was running slow.
Reviews.Author: Sahil
Reviews.Content: I use this phone for one month. it was running little slow. it get the network H+ and E .Screen is huge. phone gets very beautiful pictures.i was shocked to see the picture quility with 720 resolution.i return this phone back because running slow and it was only 8 gb. now i have i9200 16 gb mega 6.3 phone. running fast so dont be crazy  to buy this i9205 lte mega phone . you can buy i9200 mega phone . both gets same network in US . as i told you i used both phones.i would reccomend this phone for watching movies and taking pics.

Reviews.Title: Tiff
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: They sent the wrong color but the phone works fine although they do not offer insurance and I already dropped it and broke it so its $200 to get it fixed

Reviews.Title: great buy!

Reviews.Content: Its just what I wanted. The features are great and the battery lasts a long time too. Definitely would recommend.

Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife she luv it she watch movie,do banking shopping and video chat with me and her friends she also use it when she go over sea she just change the SIM card.Way to go Samsung u out did it again!!!

Reviews.Title: samsung mega 6.3

Reviews.Content: AWESOME, GREAT, LIGHT WEIGHT, EASY SETUP WITH CARRIER, FAST, BIG LETTERS, FRIENDS & COWORKERS LOVE THIS PHONE, SINCE  OBSERVING MINE  TWO COWORKERS HAVE ALSO PURCHASED ONE.

Reviews.Title: Nice & Big screen. No 4G LTE in US. slower speed for T-Mobile.
Reviews.Author: simon c
Reviews.Content: Pro: Nice & Big screen. Good for aging person.Con: No 4G LTE in US. (T-Mobile user will have slightly slower connection). Due to big screen size, dropping the phone will be end up with crack screen easily.

Reviews.Title: SATISATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "gigi"
Reviews.Content: I WOULD JUST LIKE TO HAVE A BOOK MANUAL TOO. I AM NOT SATISFIED WITH JUST THE DIGITAL FORM ON MY PHONE.THE ONLY THING I DON'T LIKE IS IT IS TO LARGE TO CARRY OUT. EVERYONE CAN HEAR YOUR CONVERSATION, IT DOESN'T MATTER IF THE SPEAKER PHONE IS ON OR NOT.

Reviews.Title: This phone is very good!
Reviews.Author: Zixuan Lei
Reviews.Content: This phone is very good, and dealer shipped the phone very fast. Screen is so big, looks like a tablet, everything works good, you guys can try it.

Reviews.Title: Love  it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Lana S.
Reviews.Content: Even though I did not get the color I ordered and the phone was not not unlocked the prompt response I received was excellent.  The phone is amazing.

Reviews.Title: The Samsung galaxy mega 6.3 is the best Mobil phone in the world.

Reviews.Content: I am Biswas Debbroto speaking that samsung galaxy mega 6.3 is the best phone in the world it  is nice to look , nice to use  nice for everything that's why when I heard that galaxy mega 6.3 is coming since then I became crazy for buying oh s*** ! Galaxy mega is the best ,unrestrained ,amazing ,awesome , already I bought it white one so beautiful don't wait throw other phones and take galaxy mega 6.3 one u must be happy , So dear customers don't wait buy it now as soon as possible ,bye thanks a lot
